Product #1: SONOS home sound.  It's amazingly controllable.  Speakers can  be what you have or wireless.  My guy installed in under 2 hours.
@tlowdon coming soon.  1st one released shortly... we are kinda going to do a countdown...one per day...Get your checkbook ready!!!

Got rid of the crutches yesterday - YEAH!  2 more weeks with the brace.  Trying to be a "compliant" patient - doesn't come naturally!
Heading home via Virgin America.  These guys are GOOD!
Support Lance's return to Tour and #LIVESTRONG global cancer fight. Add wristband to your Twitter with 1-click - http://twcauses.com/ls/
Wow, Lance Armstrong only 2 tenths of a second from the Yellow Jersey on the TdF.  Unreal.
Ugh, pulled my hamstring attempting a NY Times dock start (don't ask).  Really dumb!?!?!?  Now forced R&R. No bike for a couple of weeks ;-(
Happy Fathers Day everyone!!!!  Had a schweet bike ride this morning, brunch with family and headed to Pete's All Star Game. Life is good!
Just got the new iPhone. It's screamin' fast. Worth it big time.
Movies: Angels and Demons - Great.  Hangover - very funny.  Both worth seeing.
http://twitpic.com/7osqv - Best salad I've ever had - Lure restaurant, San mateo
@lancearmstrong Thats nothing, see this: http://tinyurl.com/l9ovdw - 2 prior DUIs, 2 dead cyclists - 4 months "home detention" - not right.
4.4 earthquake in San Jose just now.  See: http://tiny.cc/gzBrV  Felt 2 waves of the "shaker" here in Burlingame.   Exciting..kinda......
"The universe will rearrange itself according to the nature of your song."  Interesting thought of the day.....
http://twitpic.com/2i8sm - Les and I after an awesome mountain bike ride this morning.
For the market to go up, the news doesn't have to get good, it just has to get less bad. - Barton Biggs
First Tri was fun.  Swim was tough, bike went well, run was OK.  Kids did a Duo (bike/run) and all got on podium. Very proud of them!
Have my first "sprint" triathlon coming up this weekend at Stanford.  The kids are all doing a mini duo bike/run which should be fun.
Did first swimming workout (ever) today.  It was raining, but you can only get so wet in the pool :-)
http://twitpic.com/1a94l - At a volleyball tourney in "Sacto" with Annabel.

Great day in American History.  Once again, America is an inspiration around the world (it's nice to be back).  Good luck Mr President!
"government is not the solution to our problem; government IS the problem" - Ronald Reagan - First inaugural Address
The current "government will solve all our problems" mindset is pretty scary.   Some see FDR parallel, but FDR INVENTED big government...
I voted for Obama and still think he is/was the better guy, but the press love-fest is getting a little tiring.  I'm still a republican...
http://twitpic.com/za0l - Bowl of Soul at Java in Sun Valley.  The tag line says it all...
Happy Birthday to Jim AKA "Cookie", Colgate roommate, friend for 30 years.
Saw Marley and Me with the family.  Cried like a schoolboy ;-)  Good family flick, take your Wellies - be prepared for waterworks.
http://twitpic.com/xxoc - I remember $5 !!!
http://twitpic.com/xu3c - Kirky me and our snowman at Mt Baldy base in Sun Valley.
http://twitpic.com/x9aa - Above the morning fog on a morning ride a couple of weeks ago.
Went for my first real Mt Bike ride yesterday at Skaggs Point.  Was 38 degrees, but wasn't cold long.  Whoa Daddy, its a rip.
Heard the Georgetown Chimes last night -Awesome! Thanks Kruser!  More caroling this evening, apparently no one has figured out I cant sing!
Did the PV Sunday ride yesterday - 35 miles, went well - averaged 20.4 mph but couldn't catch George on the final sprint!
Got out for an awesome loop to Edgewood Rd - 20 miles, 900 KJ's.   Weather was crisp at 45 but very bearable.  I need more rap on my ipod!
FlexJobs.com kicking booty big.  We are now the #1 job site for telecommuters!  Record revenue each month for the past 5 months.  Go Sara!
Online advertising demand strong going into Christmas.  Sold out on YourDictionary.com - Who'd a thunk...  We'll see what happens in Jan.
Great day in the market, looks like the fear factor is SLOWLY wearing off.  Fed was super aggressive.  Falling in love with ETF's...
New to Twitter.  Here goes!  Got a gift basket from the LTK GE's - had everything I love - Olives, Wine, Chocolate.  You guys are the best!
